Title: Crush
Plot: Buffy notices that Dawn is spending a lot of time around Spike and surmises that she has a crush on him, which Dawn shoots down saying that Spike has a crush on Buffy. Meanwhile a vampire has attacked the passengers on a train and Buffy is finding it hard to concentrate on investigating with the thought that Spike is in love with her.
GuestStars: Frederick Dawson, Greg Wayne, Joseph Digiandomenico, Walter Borchert, Asher Glaser, Jennifer Bergman, Nell Shanahan
